=======
Indexes
=======

Let's set the default sorting of records of the "Contacts" journal.
To do so click the 
:doc:`Order </admin/items/order_dialog>`
button:

.. image:: /intro/_images/order_dlg.png
	:align: center
	:alt: Contacts order


And now we create a corresponding index for the “Contacts” journal database table. 
Click the **Indices** button to open
:doc:`Indices Dialog </admin/items/indices_dialog>` 
and then click the **New** button and specify the index:

.. image:: /intro/_images/index_dlg.png
	:align: center
	:alt: New index
